snippet: After a knee injury in January 2012 required surgery and sidelined him for the rest of the winter, as well as for the 2012-13 season, Bode Miller has returned to ski racing a changed man
abstract: Bode Miller has returned to ski racing a changed man, after a knee injury in January 2012 required surgery and sidelined him for the rest of the 2012-13 season; now one of the oldest athletes on the World Cup circuit, Miller is returning with a repaired knee, carrying 20 less pounds, and working with a new ski technician.
lead_paragraph: After a knee injury in January 2012 required surgery and sidelined him for the rest of the winter, as well as for the 2012-13 season, Bode Miller has returned to ski racing a changed man

headline.main: Olympian Has New Outlook on Life but Flashes His Old Panache on Slopes
headline.print_headline: Olympian Has New Outlook on Life but Flashes His Old Panache on Slopes
